message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a unique item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10,000. Let me know if this is something you're interested in.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
